TopicTitle: Vall's "Highlands" and "Lowlands" science descriptions appear to be swapped

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.2.0 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 10 | CPU: AMD Ryzen 7 4800H with Radeon Graphics | GPU: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 Laptop GPU | RAM: 16GB

 

Description:

When taking science from the Lowlands biome on the Jool facing side of Vall, the science description appears to describe the non Jool facing side of Vall.

The Highlands biome on the non Jool facing side of Vall appears to have descriptions of the Jool facing side, but I forgot to take a screenshot of this side.
